pullrequest.title: Updates to camera interface to add icons

content.raw:
The textbox is a bit squished and the "check connectivity" button is not square because they're being squished to fit in a box of a fixed size.

Did you intentionally set the minimumSize and maximumSize properties on formGroupBox in Qt designer? If you reset them back to default the widgets come out more normal sized.

Other than that, looks all good.
content.html:
The textbox is a bit squished and the "check connectivity" button is not square because they're being squished to fit in a box of a fixed size.

Did you intentionally set the minimumSize and maximumSize properties on formGroupBox in Qt designer? If you reset them back to default the widgets come out more normal sized.

Other than that, looks all good.
